posts.post_content:
"So I herd u liek Bloodghast..."  
  
It's almost like WOTC's development team is always looking for ways to improve [Nether Shadow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nether Shadow).  
  
"Hey guys, remember Nether Shadow?"  
"Yeah, that was good in its day. Impossible to use now, though."  
"Well, I have an idea. Here's [Bloodghast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bloodghast)!"  
"Sick, dude. Hey, here's [Gravecrawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravecrawler)!"  
"I'll raise you a Strangleroot Geist!"
